value:
It is wonderful to see the joy that a
bountiful harvest brings. If only my
siblings were here to join me...

I hear some of the Greil Mercenaries
participated in past harvest festivals.
That must have been quite the sight.

I see a pack of monsters up ahead!
Stay back, $Nu!$k$p...Oh. It appears they are simply
costumed revelers. My mistake.

My father often speaks fondly of his
time livening up the harvest festival.
I must follow in his footsteps.

It's hard to tell when a trick goes too
far...but I have a feeling my dragon
form would frighten the children.

I am Kurthnaga, Prince of Goldoa.
The harvest festival is brightening
$Nf's castle.

I must say, I am growing rather
fond of seeing everyone's reactions
to my costume.

Oh, did I frighten you? My apologies.
Such was not my intention.

My apologies... It seems I let my
excitement get the better of me. This
is my first harvest festival, you see.

Beorc and laguz... The harvest's
bounty is a gift for all.

I am Kurthnaga, Prince of Goldoa. It is
a pleasure to finally see the harvest
festival my father spoke so highly of.

I must thank you for your kind
invitation to the harvest festival,
$Nu.$k$pAskr's bounty is evident in the
sounds of celebration that fill the air.$k$pMore importantly, that chorus of
voices counts beorc, laguz, and
even gods among its number.$k$pDue to our strength, the dragon tribe
severed relations with the outside
world in order to maintain balance.$k$pThis festival has taught me that there
is wisdom in looking beyond our own
borders—a lesson I will take to heart.
たっ
お菓子を！
うわっ…
しまった…
I will have candy!
Trick or treat?
I am enjoying this.
Do I frighten you?
Forgive me, Father...
Heh...
Thank you for inviting me to your harvest festival.
*startled sound* Is this your way of frightening people?
I am unused to garments of this kind. Is my appearance acceptable?
The confections of this world come in so many wondrous colors.
I have considered asking my father for sweets, but...perhaps I better not.
To see beorc and laguz living amongst each other in harmony... I feel as if I have strayed into a dream.
I passed by some delicious looking food earlier. Would you partake with me?
Very well.
Where should we go?
Let us surprise them.
